drinks.name: '57 CHEVY WITH A WHITE LICENSE PLATE
drinks.instructions: 1. Fill a rocks glass with ice 2.add white creme de cacao and vodka 3.stir

drinks.name: 1-900-FUK-MEUP
drinks.instructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice cubes. Strain into a rocks glass.

drinks.name: 110 IN THE SHADE
drinks.instructions: Drop shooter in glass. Fill with beer

drinks.name: 151 FLORIDA BUSHWACKER
drinks.instructions: Combine all ingredients. Blend until smooth. Garnish with chocolate shavings if desired.

drinks.name: 155 BELMONT
drinks.instructions: Blend with ice. Serve in a wine glass. Garnish with carrot.

drinks.name: 24K NIGHTMARE
drinks.instructions: Add over ice,shake and pour.
Add both ingredients to shot glass, shoot, and get drunk quick

drinks.name: 3 WISE MEN
drinks.instructions: put them them in a glass... and slam it to tha head.

drinks.name: 3-MILE LONG ISLAND ICED TEA
drinks.instructions: Fill 14oz glass with ice and alcohol. Fill 2/3 glass with cola and remainder with sweet & sour. Top with dash of bitters and lemon wedge.
fill glass with crushed ice. Add vodka. Add a splash of grand-marnier. Fill with o.j.

drinks.name: 501 BLUE
drinks.instructions: Mix equal amounts into a glass with ice.

drinks.name: 69 SPECIAL
drinks.instructions: Pour 2 oz. gin. Add 4 oz. 7-up. Add Lemon Juice for flavor. If you are weak, top up glass with more 7-Up.
pour kaluha, then Baileys, then Frangelico not chilled and not layered -- SERVE!!!

drinks.name: 9 1/2 WEEKS
drinks.instructions: Combine all ingredients in glass mixer. Chill and strain into Cocktail glass. Garnish with sliced strawberry.

drinks.name: A DAY AT THE BEACH
drinks.instructions: Shake Rum, Amaretto, and Orange Juice in a shaker filled with ice. Strain over ice into a highball glass. Add Grenadine and garnish with a Pineapple Wedge and a Strawberry.

drinks.name: A FURLONG TOO LATE
drinks.instructions: Pour the rum and ginger beer into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: A GILLIGAN'S ISLAND
drinks.instructions: Shaken, not stirred!

drinks.name: A NIGHT IN OLD MANDALAY
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the light rum, añejo rum, orange juice, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the ginger ale. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: A PIECE OF ASS
drinks.instructions: Put ice in glass. Pour in shots. Fill with Sour Mix.

drinks.name: A SPLASH OF NASH
drinks.instructions: Drop shot glass with banana & melon liquers into a 9 oz hi- ball glass containing soda water and cranberry juice. Drink in one shot.

drinks.name: A TRUE AMARETTO SOUR
drinks.instructions: Rub the rim of an old fashioned glass with lemon, and dip repeatedly into granulated sugar until it has a good "frosted" rim. Shake a jigger of Amaretto with the juice of 1/2 a lemon. Strain into glass and add ice. Garnish with a Marachino Cherry.

drinks.name: A MIDSUMMERNIGHT DREAM
drinks.instructions: Mix the strawberrys in a blender Pour it together with the vodka,kirch and strawberry liquer over ice in a shaker. Shake well and pour in a highballglass. Fill up with the Russchian water

drinks.name: A. J.
drinks.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: A.D.M. (AFTER DINNER MINT)
drinks.instructions: shake vigorously

drinks.name: A1
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, mix and serve over ice into a chilled glass.

drinks.name: ABC
drinks.instructions: Layered in a shot glass.

drinks.name: ACID
drinks.instructions: Poor in the 151 first followed by the 101 served with a Coke or Dr Pepper chaser.

drinks.name: AT&T
drinks.instructions: Pour Vodka and Gin over ice, add Tonic and Stir

drinks.name: ABBEY COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except for the cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

drinks.name: ABBEY MARTINI
drinks.instructions: Put all ingredients into a shaker and mix, then strain contents into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: ABILENE
drinks.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: ABSINTHE #2
drinks.instructions: Mix together and let sit a few days. Strain through a coffee filter. To serve mix 1 part absinthe to 4 parts water, add ice, enjoy.

drinks.name: ABSOLUT EVERGREEN
drinks.instructions: Mix, pour over ice and top up with Bitter Lemon.

drinks.name: ABSOLUT SEX
drinks.instructions: Shake Absolut Kurant, Midori, and Cranberry juice in shaker with ice: Strain into rocks glass: Splash of seven on top.Absolut Sex.

drinks.name: ABSOLUT STRESS #2
drinks.instructions: Mix well. Garnish with Orange and Cherry. Enjoy

drinks.name: ABSOLUT SUMMERTIME
drinks.instructions: Add all ingredients except lemon to shaker filled with ice. Cover and shake vigorously. Strain contents into ice filled collins glass. Garnish with lemon.

drinks.name: ABSOLUT LIMOUSINE
drinks.instructions: Fill Absolut into a glass. Add Lime juice. Add Ice and lime wedges.

drinks.name: ABSOLUTELY CRANBERRY SMASH
drinks.instructions: Stir ingredients together. Serve over ice.

drinks.name: ABSOLUTELY FABULOUS
drinks.instructions: Mix the Vodka and Cranberry juice together in a shaker and strain into a glass. Top up with Champagne.

drinks.name: ABSOLUTLY SCREWED UP
drinks.instructions: Shake it up it tasts better that way, but you can stir it if you want. 6 of those and you will be wasted for the rest of the night.

drinks.name: ACAPULCO
drinks.instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients (except mint) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

drinks.name: ACE
drinks.instructions: Shake all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker and ice then strain in a cold glass.

drinks.name: ADAM
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: ADAM & EVE
drinks.instructions: Shake together all the ingredients and strain into a cold glass.

drinks.name: ADAM BOMB
drinks.instructions: Add ice to blender (or to glass if prefer on the rocks) then fruit, and fruite juice depending on personal prefference then add the Rum, Vodka, Tequila, and triple sec. blend till smooth, rim glass with sugar or salt and pour mixture in. garnish with lemon or lime slice.

drinks.name: ADAM SUNRISE
drinks.instructions: Fill blender up with ice. Fill half with Bartons Vodka. Put 10 tsp of sugar, add 1/2 can lemonade concentrate, fill to top with water. Blend for 60 seconds.

drinks.name: ADDINGTON
drinks.instructions: Mix both the vermouth's in a shaker and strain into a cold glass. Top up with a squirt of Soda Water.

drinks.name: ADDISON
drinks.instructions: Shake together all the ingredients and strain into a cold glass.

drinks.name: ADDISON SPECIAL
drinks.instructions: Combine ingredients in the order listed into a shaker. Fill half full with ice and shake well. Strain into glass with ice and garnish with a cherry and orange wedge.

drinks.name: ADIOS AMIGOS COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Shake together all the ingredients and strain into a cold glass.

drinks.name: ADONIS COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: AFFAIR
drinks.instructions: Pour schnapps, orange juice, and cranberry juice over ice in a highball glass. Top with club soda and serve.

drinks.name: AFFINITY
drinks.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: AFTER DINNER COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

drinks.name: AFTER FIVE
drinks.instructions: 1. Pour Kahlua into shot glass to about 1/2 full. 2. Using a spoon(inverted), slowly pour in the Peppermint Schnapps until glass is about 3/4 full. Done correctly, the Schnapps will flow under the Kahlua for a clear layer. 3. Again using a spoon, but this time right side up, slowly top off the glass with a layer of Bailey's. Be careful to place the spoon right at the top of the Kahlua layer and to raise it as the glass fills up. Done correctly, this will provide a layer of Bailey's floating over the Kahlua. 4. Toss it down all at once for something like a Peppermint Pattie, WITH A BANG!!! NOTE: Best if all ingredients are chilled

drinks.name: AFTER SUPPER COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: AFTER SEX
drinks.instructions: Pour the vodka and creme over some ice cubes in a tall glass and fill up with juice. to make it beuty full make the top of the glass with a grenadine and sugar

drinks.name: AFTERGLOW
drinks.instructions: Mix. Serve over ice.

drinks.name: AFTERNOON
drinks.instructions: Build into a suiting glass, with no ice. Cream on top if wanted. Served directly.

drinks.name: ALABAMA SLAMMER
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients (except for lemon juice) over ice in a highball glass. Stir, add a dash of lemon juice, and serve.

drinks.name: ALASKA COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass. Drop in a twist of lemon and serve.

drinks.name: ALEXANDER
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: ALFIE COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: ALGONQUIN
drinks.instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: ALICE COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Shake well, strain into a large cocktail glass.

drinks.name: ALICE IN WONDERLAND
drinks.instructions: Just mix the three ingredients one to one to one

drinks.name: ALLEGHENY
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: ALLIES COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: ALMERIA
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: ALMOND CHOCOLATE COFFEE
drinks.instructions: Pour in order into coffee cup. Top with whipped creme and chocolate shcvings.

drinks.name: ALMOND JOY
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: ALOHA FRUIT PUNCH
drinks.instructions: Add 1/4 cup water to ginger root. Boil 3 minutes. Strain. Add the liquid to the guava, lemon and pineapple juices. Make a syrup of sugar and remaining water. Cool. Combine with juices and pineapple. Chill throroughly.

drinks.name: AMARETTO AND CREAM
drinks.instructions: Shake well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: AMARETTO LIQUEUR
drinks.instructions: Combine sugar and 3/4 cup water in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat and simmer until all sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat and cool. In an aging container, combine apricot halves, almond extract, grain alcohol with 1/2 cup water, and brandy. Stir in cooled sugar syrup mixture. Cap and let age for 2 days. Remove apricot halves. (Save apricot halves, can be used for cooking). Add food coloring and glycerine. Stir, recap and continue aging for 1 to 2 months. Re-bottle as desired. Liqueur is ready to serve but will continue to improve with additional aging.

drinks.name: AMARETTO MIST
drinks.instructions: Pour amaretto in an old-fashioned glass over crushed ice. Add the wedge of lime and serve. (A wedge of lemon may be substituted for lime, if preferred.)

drinks.name: AMARETTO ROSE
drinks.instructions: Pour amaretto and lime juice over ice in a collins glass. Fill with club soda and serve.

drinks.name: AMARETTO SHAKE
drinks.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend at high speed until smooth. Serve in chilled glass garnished with bittersweet chocolate shavings.

drinks.name: AMARETTO SOUR
drinks.instructions: Shake and strain. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

drinks.name: AMARETTO STINGER
drinks.instructions: Shake ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: AMARETTO STONE SOUR
drinks.instructions: Shake and Serve over ice

drinks.name: AMARETTO STONE SOUR #3
drinks.instructions: Shake sour mix, tequila and amaretto with ice. Strain into highball glass. Add a splash of OJ. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

drinks.name: AMARETTO SUNRISE
drinks.instructions: Mix together the amaretto and orange juice. Pour into glass and then add the grenadine untill you see the sunrise.

drinks.name: AMARETTO SUNSET
drinks.instructions: Shake ingredients in bartender's mixer quickly, just 5 shakes. Strain out ice, serve in glass immediately with a slice of orange.

drinks.name: AMARETTO SWEET & SOUR
drinks.instructions: Fill the blender with 3/4 ice. Add sweet & sour mix to the top of the ice. Add about 1" of pineapple juice, 1/2" of melon liqeur, and 1/2 to 1/4" of amaretto. Then blend the mix until it is of margaritta consistency or thinner.

drinks.name: AMARETTO TEA
drinks.instructions: Pour hot tea into a pousse-cafe glass, using a spoon in glass to prevent cracking. Add amaretto, but do not stir. Top with chilled whipped cream and serve.

drinks.name: AMERICANO
drinks.instructions: Pour the Campari and vermouth over ice into glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice.

drinks.name: ANGEL FACE
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: ANGELICA LIQUEUR
drinks.instructions: Combine all herbs, nuts and spices with vodka in a 1 quart or larger aging container. Cap tightly and shake daily for 2 weeks. Strain through a fine muslin cloth or coffee filter, discarding solids. Clean out aging container. Place liquid back in container. Place sugar and water in saucepan and stir to combine over medium heat. When sugar is completely dissolved, set aside and let cool. When cool combine with food coloring and add to liqueur liquid. Cap and allow to age and mellow in a cool, dark place for one month.

drinks.name: APELLO
drinks.instructions: Stirr. Grnish with maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: APPLE BERRY SMOOTHIE
drinks.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

drinks.name: APPLE CIDER PUNCH #1
drinks.instructions: If you use the whole all spice and cloves, tie them in cheesecloth. Heat the mixture. Stir occasionally. If you want an alcoholic drink, rum would be nice.

drinks.name: APPLE GRANDE
drinks.instructions: Chill both ingredients!! Mix in a tumbler and enjoy!

drinks.name: APPLE KARATE
drinks.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: APPLE PIE WITH A CRUST
drinks.instructions: Just mix the two liquids and sprinkle in the cinnamon. Serve either cold or heated.

drinks.name: APPLE SLAMMER
drinks.instructions: pour into a shot glass and present to consumer, they are expected to cover the top of the shotglass with thier palm, raise the glass, slam it on the bar and the swallow quickly.

drinks.name: APPLECAR
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: APPLEJACK
drinks.instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass, chill and strain into cocktail glass

drinks.name: APRICOT LADY
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, apricot brandy, triple sec, lemon juice, and egg white. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the orange slice.

drinks.name: APRICOT PUNCH
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingrediants into a large punch bowl. Add ice and 4 oranges that are peeled and divided.

drinks.name: ARCHBISHOP
drinks.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

drinks.name: ARCTIC FISH
drinks.instructions: Fill glass with ice and fish, add vodka, grape soda and orange juice. DO NOT STIR!!!!! Serve well chilled.

drinks.name: ARCTIC MOUTHWASH
drinks.instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender on high until ice is finely crushed. It should be of a slushy consistency. Pour immediately and serve.

drinks.name: ARISE MY LOVE
drinks.instructions: Put creme de menthe into a champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne and serve.

drinks.name: ARIZONA ANTIFREEZE
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shot glass and slam !!!!

drinks.name: ARIZONA STINGERS
drinks.instructions: Place ice cubes in the hurricane glass . Add the 2 HEAPING shots of Absolute Vodka (Note: You can add as many shots of Absolute as you want!) Fill the rest of glass with the Arizona Icetea with lemon. Stir to mix using a spoon. Drink up and enjoy!!!!!!!

drinks.name: ARIZONA TWISTER
drinks.instructions: Just mix in the shots of rum, vodka, and tequila. Add splashes of the three juices, heavy on the pineapple. Top off with grenadine. Crushed ice should already be in glass. Top off the glass with a pineapple wedge.

drinks.name: ARMY SPECIAL
drinks.instructions: Pour Vodka, Gin and lime cordial into glass, and top up with crushed ice. Wait for ice to melt slightly and sip without a straw.

drinks.name: ARTHUR TOMPKINS
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Grand Marnier, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: ARTILLERY
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: ARTILLERY PUNCH
drinks.instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a large punch bowl with a block of ice. If found too dry, sugar syrup may be added. Decorate with twists of lemon peel.

drinks.name: ATLANTIC SUN
drinks.instructions: Shake all the ingredients, top the drink with soda. Garnish with a slice of orange.

drinks.name: ATOMIC LOKADE
drinks.instructions: In a shaker, place lemonade, vodka, blue Curacao, and triple sec together. Shake with ice and strain into glass. Add sugar to taste

drinks.name: AUBURN HEADBANGER
drinks.instructions: Mix in spread glass over ice. Strain and pour in shot glass. Sit down before shotting. ENJOY!!

drinks.name: AUTODAFÉ
drinks.instructions: Mix and fill up with soda water. Drunk by finns on a sunny day any time of the year and day.

drinks.name: AVALANCHE
drinks.instructions: Mix in highball glass over ice, shake well.

drinks.name: AVALON
drinks.instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice. Layer the Finlandia Vodka, lemon and apple juices, Pisang Ambon, and top up with lemonade. Stir slightly and garnish with a spiralled cucumber skin and a red cherry. The cucumber provides zest and looks attractive. This drink, created by Timo Haimi, took first prize in the 1991 Finlandia Vodka Long Drink Competition.

drinks.name: AVIATION
drinks.instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: AZTEC PUNCH
drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a pitcher. Mix thoroughly and pour into whatever is available, the bigger the better! This drink packs a big punch, so don't over do it.

drinks.name: B-52
drinks.instructions: Layer ingredients into a shot glass. Serve with a stirrer.

drinks.name: B-53
drinks.instructions: Layer the Kahlua, Sambucca and Grand Marnier into a shot glas in that order. Better than B-52

drinks.name: BABY ESKIMO
drinks.instructions: Leave ice-cream out for about 10 minutes. Add ingredients in order, stir with chopstick (butter knife or spoon works too). Consume immediately and often. Nice and light, great for following a heavy drink.

drinks.name: BABY GUINNESS
drinks.instructions: Pour Kahlua, almost filling shot glass. Then, carefully pour Baileys, using wall of shot glass. This will give the "Guinness" its "head".

drinks.name: BACARDI COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Shake together with ice. Strain into glass and serve.

drinks.name: BAILEY'S DREAM SHAKE
drinks.instructions: Blend ingredients for 30 seconds. Definitely refreshing for a hot summer's day !

drinks.name: BALMORAL
drinks.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: BANANA CANTALOUPE SMOOTHIE
drinks.instructions: Juice cantaloupe, pour juice into blender, add banana, and liquify.

drinks.name: BANANA DAIQUIRI
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: BANANA MILK SHAKE
drinks.instructions: Blend very well, preferably in a household mixer. Serve in a wine glass, garnish with whipped cream and a piece of banana.

drinks.name: BANANA STRAWBERRY SHAKE
drinks.instructions: Blend all together in a blender until smooth.

drinks.name: BANANA STRAWBERRY SHAKE DAIQUIRI-TYPE
drinks.instructions: Blend all together in a blender until smooth.

drinks.name: BARRACUDA
drinks.instructions: Shake pour ingredients with ice. Strain into glass, top with Sparkling wine.

drinks.name: BELGIAN BLUE
drinks.instructions: Just pour all ingredients in the glass and stir...

drinks.name: BELLINI
drinks.instructions: Pour peach purée into chilled flute, add sparkling wine. Stir gently.

drinks.name: BELLINI MARTINI
drinks.instructions:
Add ice cubes to shaker.
Add vodka.
Add peach schnapps.
Add peach nectar.
Shake.
Strain into glass.
Add lemon twist peel.

drinks.name: BERMUDA HIGHBALL
drinks.instructions: Pour brandy, gin, and dry vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

drinks.name: BERRY DEADLY
drinks.instructions: Add all ingredients to large bowl. Stir gently. Serve chilled.

drinks.name: BETWEEN THE SHEETS
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: BIBLE BELT
drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients, and pour over ice.

drinks.name: BIG RED
drinks.instructions: Pour ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass

drinks.name: BLACK & TAN
drinks.instructions: Fill pint glass half full with Bass. Next pour Guiness over a spoon slowly until glass is full. If done correctly the Guiness will stay on top and the Bass on bottom hence the name Black & Tan.

drinks.name: BLACK FOREST SHAKE
drinks.instructions: In a blender put ice cubes, chocolate syrup, cherry brandy, vodka, and milk. Blend very well.

drinks.name: BLACK RUSSIAN
drinks.instructions: Pour the ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

drinks.name: BLACK AND BROWN
drinks.instructions: CAREFULLY to avoid explosive head formation: Pour Beer glass half full of favorite rootbeer and top off with Guinness.

drinks.name: BLACKTHORN
drinks.instructions: Stir sloe gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: BLEEDING SURGEON
drinks.instructions: Pour Shot of Rum over slice of orange. Fill the remaining space in glass half way full of surge or similar drink. Finish off glass with cranberry juice. Be carefull, warm surge may foam over the glass.

drinks.name: BLIND RUSSIAN
drinks.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add all liquers. Add milk. shake.

drinks.name: BLOODY MARIA
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

drinks.name: BLOODY MARY
drinks.instructions: Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish.

drinks.name: BLUE LAGOON
drinks.instructions: Pour vodka and curacao over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: BLUE MARGARITA
drinks.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime juice. Dip rim in coarse salt. Shake tequila, blue curacao, and lime juice with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

drinks.name: BLUE MOUNTAIN
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass alomst filled with ice cubes.

drinks.name: BLUEBIRD
drinks.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine the gin, triple sec, Curacao, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist and the cherry.

drinks.name: BOB MARLEY
drinks.instructions: Layer in a 2 oz shot glass or pony glass

drinks.name: BOBBY BURNS COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: BOOMERANG
drinks.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, bitters, and maraschino liqueur. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

drinks.name: BOOZY SNICKERS MILKSHAKE
drinks.instructions: Place the snickers bars in a plastic bag and roll over them with a rolling pin until crushed. Add crushed snickers pieces, ice cream, milk, caramel sauce, chocolate sauce, and chocolate liquor to a blender. Blend until shake is thick and frothy. Pour into glasses and top with chocolate liquor and whip cream.

drinks.name: BORA BORA
drinks.instructions: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a highball glass on the rocks. Garnish with 1 slice of pineapple and one cherry.

drinks.name: BOSTON SIDECAR
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: BOSTON SOUR
drinks.instructions: Shake juice of lemon, powdered sugar, blended whiskey, and egg white with cracked ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: BOURBON SLING
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and bourbon. Shake well. Strain well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: BOURBON SOUR
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a whiskey sour glass, garnish with the orange slice and cherry.

drinks.name: BOXCAR
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

drinks.name: BRAIN FART
drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients together. Slowly and gently. Works best if ice is added to punch bowl and soda's are very cold.

drinks.name: BRAINTEASER
drinks.instructions: layered erin first, then sambuca and then avocart(should sit in middle of other two. To drink: use a straw to suck up avocart then shot the rest and then suck fumes up through straw.

drinks.name: BRAMBLE
drinks.instructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Build gin, lemon juice and simple syrup over. Stir, and then pour blackberry liqueur over in a circular fashion to create marbling effect. Garnish with two blackberries and lemon slice.

drinks.name: BRANDON AND WILL'S COKE FLOAT
drinks.instructions: Scoop two large scoops of vanilla ice-cream into frosted beer mug. Next, add 2 ounces Maker's Mark. Then, pour in coke. Gently stir and enjoy.

drinks.name: BRANDY ALEXANDER
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: BRANDY COBBLER
drinks.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the brandy. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

drinks.name: BRANDY FLIP
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

drinks.name: BRANDY SOUR
drinks.instructions: Shake brandy, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the lemon slice, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: BRAVE BULL SHOOTER
drinks.instructions: Pour Tabasco into bottom of shot glass and fill with tequila.

drinks.name: BRUCE'S PUCE
drinks.instructions: In a regular-sized shot glass, layer, with a spoon or cherry, the grenadine , the Kahlua , then the Bailey's Irish cream in equal portions. It goes down really smooth ,and you don't even need a chaser. It tastes just like chocolate milk.(Really!)

drinks.name: BRUISED HEART
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients in a mixing tin over ice, stir, and strain into shot glass

drinks.name: BUBBLE GUM
drinks.instructions: Layer in order into a shot glass.

drinks.name: BUCCANEER
drinks.instructions: Pour the corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the bacardi limon into the beer stir very gently

drinks.name: BUMBLE BEE #1
drinks.instructions: This is a layered shot. First pour the Bailey's into the shot glass. Then take an upside down spoon and touch it to the inside wall of the glass. Carefully add the Kahlua. Repeat this process for the Sambuca. If done properly, the alcohol will stay separated and resemble a bumble bee. Enjoy!!!

drinks.name: BUTTER BABY
drinks.instructions: Blend together in a blender. Serve in a chilled Beer mug with Fresh Blueberries and caramel for topping.

drinks.name: CAFE SAVOY
drinks.instructions: Fill mug almost to top with coffee.Add milk, triple sec and brandy. Stir.

drinks.name: CAIPIRINHA
drinks.instructions: Place lime and sugar into old fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with ice and add the Cachaça.

drinks.name: CAIPIRISSIMA
drinks.instructions: Same as Caipirinha but instead of cachaca you add WHITE RUM. It's great!!!!!!!!

drinks.name: CALIFORNIA LEMONADE
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over shaved ice. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with slices of orange and lemon. Add the cherry and serve with a straw.

drinks.name: CALIFORNIA ROOT BEER
drinks.instructions: Put Kahlua and Galliano in highball glass fill with soda

drinks.name: CAMPARI BEER
drinks.instructions: Use a 15 oz glass. Add Campari first. Fill with beer.

drinks.name: CARIBBEAN BOILERMAKER
drinks.instructions: Pour the Corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the rum into the beer.

drinks.name: CARIBBEAN ORANGE LIQUEUR
drinks.instructions: Pare very thinly the bright-colored rind from the oranges (no white). Blot the peel on paper towels to remove any excess oil. Put peel in a 4 cup screw-top jar. Add 2 cups vodka. Close jar. Store in a cool, dark place for 2 days or until the vodka has absorbed the flavor. Remove peel and add remaining vodka. Close jar and add remaining cup of vodka. Close the jar and store in a cool dark place at least 1 month to age.

drinks.name: CASINO
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry. Serve without a straw.

drinks.name: CASINO ROYALE
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

drinks.name: CASTILLIAN HOT CHOCOLATE
drinks.instructions: Shift the cocoa and sugar together into a medium-sized saucepan. Dissolve the cornstarch in the water, and stir into the cocoa and sugar until it is a smooth paste. Begin heating the mixture, stirring it with a whisk, and gradually pour in the milk. Continue stirring with the whisk as you bring the liquid to a simmer. Allow the chocolate to simmer for about 10 minutes, stirring often, until it is thick, glossy and completely smooth. Serve steaming hot in coffee mug. Serves six.

drinks.name: CHAMPAGNE COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. Add cognac followed by gently pouring chilled champagne. Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: CHERRY ELECTRIC LEMONADE
drinks.instructions: Now stir vigorously and then pour over a large cup of ice. Now drink it with a straw and stir occasionally.

drinks.name: CHERRY RUM
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: CHICAGO FIZZ
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: CHOCOLATE BEVERAGE
drinks.instructions: Boil milk in the top of a deep double boiler five minutes. Remove from fire and add chocolate, mixed with the cinnamon, a little at a time, beating with molinillo or egg beater after each addition. When the chocolate is thoroughly blended, heat to the boiling point. Place over bottom of double boiler and add eggs, whipping constantly, until they are thoroughly blended and the mixture is frothing. Serve in coffee mug. Serves eight.

drinks.name: CHOCOLATE BLACK RUSSIAN
drinks.instructions: Combine all ingredients in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and serve.

drinks.name: CHOCOLATE DRINK
drinks.instructions: Melt the bar in a small amount of boiling water. Add milk. Cook over low heat, whipping gently (with a whisk, i would assume) until heated well. Don't let it boil! Serve in coffee mug.

drinks.name: CHOCOLATE MILK
drinks.instructions: Put the milk in the bottom, pour the Liquer on top and add the dash of amaretto. Do not mix. SLAM IT!

drinks.name: CHOCOLATE MONKEY
drinks.instructions: blend liqeuors with ice-cream, milk and syrup. pour into parfait glass, top with whipped cream and garnish with banana and cherry.

drinks.name: CITRUS COKE
drinks.instructions: Pour half of coke in a glass. Then add Bacardi and top it off with the remaining coke. Stir and drink up!

drinks.name: CITY SLICKER
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: CLASSIC OLD-FASHIONED
drinks.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the bitters and water into the sugar cube, using the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the bourbon. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

drinks.name: CLOVE COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: CLOVER CLUB
drinks.instructions: Dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up.

drinks.name: COFFEE LIQUEUR
drinks.instructions: Combine coffee, sugar and water. Simmer 1 hour and let cool. Add vanilla and vodka. Age in sealed jar 2 to 3 weeks.

drinks.name: COFFEE-VODKA
drinks.instructions: Boil water and sugar until dissolved. Turn off heat. Slowly add dry instant coffee and continue stirring. Add a chopped vanilla bean to the vodka, then combine the cooled sugar syrup and coffee solution with the vodka. Cover tightly and shake vigorously each day for 3 weeks. Strain and filter. Its also best to let the sugar mixture cool completely so the vodka won't evaporate when its added. If you like a smoother feel to the liqueur you can add about 1 teaspoon of glycerine to the finished product.

drinks.name: COKE AND DROPS
drinks.instructions: Take a glass, pour the Coke in the glass, then you take 7 drops of lemon juice. Granish with a lemon slice on the rim of the glass.

drinks.name: COSMOPOLITAN
drinks.instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and double strain into large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

drinks.name: COSMOPOLITAN MARTINI
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients in mixing glass half filled with ice, shake and strain into chilled Martini glass.

drinks.name: CRANBERRY CORDIAL
drinks.instructions: Place the chopped cranberries in a 2 liter jar that has a tight-fitting lid. Add the sugar and rum. Adjust the lid securely and place the jar in a cool, dark place. Invert the jar and shake it every day for six weeks. Strain the cordial into bottles and seal with corks.

drinks.name: CRANBERRY PUNCH
drinks.instructions: Combine first four ingredients. Stir until sugar is dissolved, chill. Then add ginger ale just before serving. Add ice ring to keep punch cold.

drinks.name: CREAM SODA
drinks.instructions: Pour 1oz of Spiced Rum into a highball glass with ice. Fill with Ginger Ale.

drinks.name: CREME DE MENTHE
drinks.instructions: Bring sugar and water to a boil and simmer for 10 minutes. Cool. Add the remaining ingredients and stir. Cover and let ripen for 1 month.

drinks.name: CUBA LIBRA
drinks.instructions: Fill tall glass with ice cubes. Add rum. Rub cut edge of lime on rim of glass then squeeze juice into glass. Fill with Coca-Cola. Garnish with lime slice. Enjoy!

drinks.name: CUBA LIBRE
drinks.instructions: Build all ingredients in a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: DAIQUIRI
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: DAMNED IF YOU DO
drinks.instructions: Pour into shot glass. Put in mouth. Repeat as deemed necessary.

drinks.name: DANBOOKA
drinks.instructions: pour it in and mix it.

drinks.name: DARK CAIPIRINHA
drinks.instructions:
Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in an old-fashioned glass.
Fill the glass with ice cubes.
Pour the cachaca into the glass.
Stir well.

drinks.name: DARK AND STORMY
drinks.instructions: In a highball glass filled with ice add 6cl dark rum and top with ginger beer. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: DARKWOOD SLING
drinks.instructions: There are many good cherry liqueurs you can use, but I prefere Heering. Add one share of the liqueur. Then you add one share of Soda. For a sour sling use Tonic (most people prefer the drink without Tonic). Afterwards you fill the glass with Orange Juice and ice cubes.

drinks.name: DERBY
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint in the drink.

drinks.name: DIESEL
drinks.instructions: Pour the lager first then add the blackcurrant cordial. Top up with the cider. The colour sholud be very dark approaching the colour of Guiness.

drinks.name: DIRTY MARTINI
drinks.instructions:
Pour the vodka, dry vermouth and olive brine into a cocktail shaker with a handful of ice and shake well.
Rub the rim of a martini glass with the wedge of lemon.
Strain the contents of the cocktail shaker into the glass and add the olive.
A dirty Martini contains a splash of olive brine or olive juice and is typically garnished with an olive.

drinks.name: DIRTY NIPPLE
drinks.instructions: This is a layered shot - the Bailey's must be on top

drinks.name: DOWNSHIFT
drinks.instructions: Start with the Sprite. Next comes the tequila. After that, add the Minute Maid Fruit Punch, then float the 151. Rocks optional.

drinks.name: DRAGONFLY
drinks.instructions: In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and ginger ale. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

drinks.name: DRINKING CHOCOLATE
drinks.instructions: Heat the cream and milk with the cinnamon and vanilla bean very slowly for 15-20 minutes. (If you don't have any beans add 1-2 tsp of vanilla after heating). Remove the bean and cinnamon. Add the chocolate. Mix until fully melted. Serve topped with some very dense fresh whipped cream. Serves 1-2 depending upon how much of a glutton you are. For a richer chocolate, use 4 oz of milk, 4 oz of cream, 4 oz of chocolate. Serve in coffee mug.

drinks.name: DRY ROB ROY
drinks.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: DUBONNET COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: DUCHAMP'S PUNCH
drinks.instructions:
Shake all ingredients.
Double strain in a chilled double old fashioned glass with abig ice cube.
Garnish with a couple of lavender sprigs

drinks.name: EGG CREAM
drinks.instructions: Mix syrup and milk in a fountain glass. Add soda water, serve with a straw.

drinks.name: EGG NOG #4
drinks.instructions: In a small mixer bowl beat egg yolks till blended. Gradually add 1/4 cup sugar, beating at high speed till thick and lemon colored. Stir in milk, stir in rum, bourbon, vanilla, and salt. Chill thoroughly. Whip cream. Wash beaters well. In a large mixer bowl beat egg whites till soft peaks form. Gradually add remaining 1/4 cup sugar, beating to stiff peaks. Fold yolk mixture and whipped cream into egg whites. Serve immediately. Sprinkle nutmeg over each serving. Serve in a punch bowl or another big bowl. NOTE: For a nonalcoholic eggnog, prepare Eggnog as above, except omit the bourbon and rum and increase the milk to 3 cups.

drinks.name: EGG NOG - HEALTHY
drinks.instructions: Whip egg substitute and sugar together, combine with the two kinds of milk, vanilla, and rum. Mix well. Chill over night. Sprinkle with nutmeg. Makes 6 servings.

drinks.name: EGG-NOG - CLASSIC COOKED
drinks.instructions: In large saucepan, beat together eggs, sugar and salt, if desired. Stir in 2 cups of the milk. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is thick enough to coat a metal spoon and reaches 160 degrees F. Remove from heat. Stir in remaining 2 cups milk and vanilla. Cover and regfigerate until thoroughly chilled, several hours or overnight. Just before serving, pour into bowl or pitcher. Garnish or add stir-ins, if desired. Choose 1 or several of: Chocolate curls, cinnamon sticks, extracts of flavorings, flavored brandy or liqueur, fruit juice or nectar, ground nutmeg, maraschino cherries, orange slices, peppermint sticks or candy canes, plain brandy, run or whiskey, sherbet or ice-cream, whipping cream, whipped. Serve immediately.

drinks.name: ENGLISH HIGHBALL
drinks.instructions: Pour brandy, gin, and sweet vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Add the twist of lemon peel, stir, and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

drinks.name: ENGLISH ROSE COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim of glass in powdered sugar. Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into sugar-rimmed glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

drinks.name: ESPRESSO MARTINI
drinks.instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into chilled martini glass

drinks.name: FAHRENHEIT 5000
drinks.instructions: Cover bottom of shot glass with Tabasco Sauce and then fill with half Firewater and half Absolut Peppar.

drinks.name: FLAMING DR. PEPPER
drinks.instructions: Add Amaretto, Bacardi, and vodka. Mix in the Dr. Pepper and beer

drinks.name: FLAMING LAMBORGHINI
drinks.instructions: Pour the Sambuca and Kahlua into the Cocktail Glass and give the drinker a straw. Pour the Baileys and Blue Curacao into two sepsrate shot glasses either side of the cocktail glass. Set light the concotion in the cocktail glass and start to drink through the straw (this drink should be drunk in one) , as the bottom of the glass is reached put out the fire by pouring the Baileys and Blue Curacao into the cocktail glass and keep drinking till it's all gone!!

drinks.name: FLANDER'S FLAKE-OUT
drinks.instructions: Bang 'em both in.

drinks.name: FLYING DUTCHMAN
drinks.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and triple sec. Stir well.

drinks.name: FLYING SCOTCHMAN
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: FOXY LADY
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: FRAPPÉ
drinks.instructions: Mix together. Blend at highest blender speed for about 1 minute. Pour into a glass and drink with a straw. Notes: This works best if everything is cold (if you make fresh coffee, mix it with the milk and let it sit in the fridge for 1/2 hour. If it is not frothy, add more milk, or even just some more milk powder. The froth gradually turns to liquid at the bottom of the glass, so you will find that you can sit and drink this for about 1/2 hour, with more iced coffee continually appearing at the bottom. Very refreshing.

drinks.name: FREDDY KRUGER
drinks.instructions: make it an ample size shot!!

drinks.name: FRENCH "75"
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, sugar, and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass. Top with the Champagne. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

drinks.name: FRENCH 75
drinks.instructions: Combine gin, sugar, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled champagne glass. Top up with Champagne. Stir gently.

drinks.name: FRENCH CONNECTION
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

drinks.name: FRENCH MARTINI
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

drinks.name: FRISCO SOUR
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except slices of lemon and lime) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the slices of lemon and lime and serve.

drinks.name: FROZEN DAIQUIRI
drinks.instructions: Combine all ingredients (except for the cherry) in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for five seconds, then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: FROZEN MINT DAIQUIRI
drinks.instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

drinks.name: FROZEN PINEAPPLE DAIQUIRI
drinks.instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

drinks.name: FRUIT COOLER
drinks.instructions: Toss strawberries with sugar, and let sit overnight in refrigerator. Cut lemon, reserve two slices. Juice the rest. Mix together the lemon juice, strawberries, apple juice, and soda water. Add slices of lemon (decor, really). In glasses, put ice cubes, and a slice of apple. Pour drink in, and serve.

drinks.name: FRUIT FLIP-FLOP
drinks.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: FRUIT SHAKE
drinks.instructions: Blend til smooth.

drinks.name: FUZZY ASSHOLE
drinks.instructions: fill coffe mug half full of coffee. Fill the other half full of Peach Schnapps. Stir and drink while hot.

drinks.name: GG
drinks.instructions: Pour the Galliano liqueur over ice. Fill the remainder of the glass with ginger ale and thats all there is to it. You now have a your very own GG.

drinks.name: GAGLIARDO
drinks.instructions: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass. This is a home cocktail of American/Internet Bar del Pozzo, Pavia, Italy.

drinks.name: GENTLEMAN'S CLUB
drinks.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

drinks.name: GIDEON'S GREEN DINOSAUR
drinks.instructions: Add all ingredients in collins glass with ice and stir.

drinks.name: GIN AND TONIC
drinks.instructions: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

drinks.name: GIN COOLER
drinks.instructions: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and add gin. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end of the orange spiral dangles over rim of glass.

drinks.name: GIN DAISY
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the wine, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

drinks.name: GIN FIZZ
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into glass. Top with soda water.

drinks.name: GIN RICKEY
drinks.instructions: Half-fill a tall glass with ice. Mix the gin and Grenadine together and pour over the ice. Add the lime or lemon juice and top off with soda water. Decorate the glass with lime and/or lemon slices.

drinks.name: GIN SLING
drinks.instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of water and juice of lemon. Add gin. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

drinks.name: GIN SMASH
drinks.instructions: Muddle sugar with carbonated water and mint sprigs in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and 1 ice cube. Stir, add the orange slice and the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: GIN SOUR
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

drinks.name: GIN SQUIRT
drinks.instructions: Stir gin, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with the pineapple chunks and the strawberries and serve.

drinks.name: GIN SWIZZLE
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, gin, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a colling glass with ice cubes. Stir until the glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

drinks.name: GIN TODDY
drinks.instructions: Mix powdered sugar and water in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and one ice cube. Stir, add the twist of lemon peel, and serve.

drinks.name: GIRL FROM IPANEMA
drinks.instructions: Add the cachaca, lemon juice and syrup to your boston glass. Add ice and shake until ice cold. Pour into a chilled flute and top-up with Champagne

drinks.name: GLUEHWEIN
drinks.instructions: Boil sugar and spices in water, leave in the water for 30 minutes. Strain the spiced water and mix with the wine. Heat slowly until short of boiling temperature. (To remove alcohol, let it boil for a while.) You may add lemon or orange juice to taste. Serve in irish coffee cup.

drinks.name: GODCHILD
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

drinks.name: GODFATHER
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

drinks.name: GODMOTHER
drinks.instructions: Pour vodka and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

drinks.name: GOLDEN DREAM
drinks.instructions: Shake with cracked ice. Strain into glass and serve.

drinks.name: GRAND BLUE
drinks.instructions: Serve in an old fashioned glass.

drinks.name: GRAPE LEMON PINEAPPLE SMOOTHIE
drinks.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

drinks.name: GRASS SKIRT
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, pineapple juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the pineapple slice.

drinks.name: GRASSHOPPER
drinks.instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: GREEN GOBLIN
drinks.instructions: Cider First, Lager then Curacao

drinks.name: GRIM REAPER
drinks.instructions: Mix Kahlua and 151 in glass. Quickly add ice and pour grenadine over ice to give ice red tint.

drinks.name: GRIZZLY BEAR
drinks.instructions: Served over ice. Sounds nasty, but tastes great.

drinks.name: H.D.
drinks.instructions: Mix the whisky and Baileys Cream in a beer-glass (at least 50 cl). Fill the rest of the glass with coffee.

drinks.name: HAPPY SKIPPER
drinks.instructions: Pour Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum over ice, fill glass to top with Ginger Ale. Garnish with lime. Tastes like a cream soda. Named for the Gilligan's Island reference ("The Captain" *in* "Ginger" is a Happy Skipper!)

drinks.name: HARVEY WALLBANGER
drinks.instructions: Stir the vodka and orange juice with ice in the glass, then float the Galliano on top. Garnish and serve.

drinks.name: HAVANA COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: HAWAIIAN COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: HEMINGWAY SPECIAL
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake.

drinks.name: HERBAL FLAME
drinks.instructions: Pour Hot Damn 100 in bottom of a jar or regular glass. Fill the rest of the glass with sweet tea. Stir with spoon, straw, or better yet a cinnamon stick and leave it in.

drinks.name: HIGHLAND FLING COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

drinks.name: HOLLOWEEN PUNCH
drinks.instructions: Take a bunch of grape juice and a bunch of fizzy stuff (club soda, ginger ale, lemonlime, whatever). Mix them in a punch bowl. Take orange sherbet and lime sherbet. Scoop out scoops and float them in the punch, let them melt a little so that a nasty film spreads all over the top of the punch but there are still "bubbles" in it in the form of sherbet scoops. Looks horrible, tastes just fine.

drinks.name: HOMEMADE KAHLUA
drinks.instructions: Dissolve sugar in 2 cups of boiling water and add corn syrup. Dissolve the instant coffee in the remaining water. Pour syrup and coffee in a gallon jug. Let it cool. Add vodka and vanilla when cold. For the best result, let the mixture "mature" for 4-5 weeks.

drinks.name: HORSE'S NECK
drinks.instructions: Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon zest. If desired, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.

drinks.name: HOT CHOCOLATE TO DIE FOR
drinks.instructions: Melt the chocolate, butter and vanilla in a double boiler. When just smooth stir in the cream.

drinks.name: HOT CREAMY BUSH
drinks.instructions: Combine all ingredients in glass

drinks.name: ICE PICK #1
drinks.instructions: Put Vodka in glass fill with iced tea. Stir in lemon to taste.

drinks.name: ICED COFFEE
drinks.instructions: Mix together until coffee and sugar is dissolved. Add milk. Shake well. Using a blender or milk shake maker produces a very foamy drink. Serve in coffee mug.

drinks.name: ICED COFFEE FILLIP
drinks.instructions: Mix together in a coffee mug and chill before serving.

drinks.name: IMPERIAL COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: IMPERIAL FIZZ
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: IPAMENA
drinks.instructions: Cut half a lime into pieces, place in a shaker, add the sugar and crush. Measure the passion fruit juice, add it to the shaker and fill up with ice cubes. Close the shaker and shake vigorously. Pour the liquid into a glass, top up with ginger ale, stir with a teaspoon and then garnish the rim of the glass with a slice of lime

drinks.name: IRISH COFFEE
drinks.instructions: Heat the coffee, whiskey and sugar; do not boil. Pour into glass and top with cream; serve hot.

drinks.name: IRISH CREAM
drinks.instructions: Mix scotch and milk. Add half-and-half. Add rest.

drinks.name: IRISH CURDLING COW
drinks.instructions: Pour Irish Cream, Vodka, and Bourbon in a glass. Add some ice and mix in the orange juice.

drinks.name: IRISH RUSSIAN
drinks.instructions: Add the ingredients in the order listed in the recipe. Care must be taken when adding the Guinness to prevent an excess of foam. Do Not add ice.

drinks.name: IRISH SPRING
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients (except orange slice and cherry) into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange, add the cherry on top, and serve.

drinks.name: JACK ROSE COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: JACK'S VANILLA COKE
drinks.instructions: After pouring in your ingredients, and adding 3-5 ice cubes, according to taste. Stir the drink with a stirrer to get the Vanilla off the bottom.

drinks.name: JACKHAMMER
drinks.instructions: Serve over ice- Warning,Deadly!

drinks.name: JAM DONUT
drinks.instructions: Coat the rim of a shot glass with sugar using sugar syrup to stick. Add the Chambord raspberry liqueur to the shot glass, and carefully layer the Baileys Irish Cream on top. Serve.

drinks.name: JAMAICA KISS
drinks.instructions: Fill a tumbler with ice cubes. Add a shot of Tia Maria and a shot of Jamaican light rum. Fill the tumbler with milk. Blend until smooth and serve immediately.

drinks.name: JAMAICAN COFFEE
drinks.instructions: Stir the rum, coffee and water together. Top with the whipped cream. Sprinkle with a pinch of well ground coffee and drink with a straw.

drinks.name: JAPANESE FIZZ
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: JELLO SHOTS
drinks.instructions: Boil 3 cups of water then add jello. Mix jello and water until jello is completely disolved. Add the two cups of vodka and mix together. Pour mixture into plastic shot glasses and chill until firm. Then, eat away...

drinks.name: JELLY BEAN
drinks.instructions: mix equal parts in pony glass-tastes just like a jelly bean!

drinks.name: JEWEL OF THE NILE
drinks.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: JITTERBUG
drinks.instructions: Wet glass, dip rim in sugar. Then add Ice. Then add everything else. It's that simple!

drinks.name: JOHN COLLINS
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish. Add a dash of Angostura bitters.

drinks.name: JUST A MOONMINT
drinks.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: KAMIKAZE
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients together with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

drinks.name: KARSK
drinks.instructions: Put a copper coin in a coffe-cup and fill up with coffee until you no longer see the coin, then add alcohol until you see the coin. Norwegian speciality.

drinks.name: KENTUCKY B AND B
drinks.instructions: Pour the bourbon and Benedictine into a brandy snifter.

drinks.name: KENTUCKY COLONEL
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the courbon and Benedictine. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: KILL THE COLD SMOOTHIE
drinks.instructions: Juice ginger and lemon and add it to hot water. You may add cardomom.

drinks.name: KIOKI COFFEE
drinks.instructions: Stir. Add whipped cream to the top.

drinks.name: KIR
drinks.instructions: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up with wine.

drinks.name: KIR ROYALE
drinks.instructions: Pour Creme de cassis in glass, gently pour champagne on top

drinks.name: KISS ME QUICK
drinks.instructions: mix in the glass

drinks.name: KIWI LEMON
drinks.instructions: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of kiwi.

drinks.name: KIWI PAPAYA SMOOTHIE
drinks.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

drinks.name: KOOL FIRST AID
drinks.instructions: Add Kool Aid to a double shot glass, and top with rum. Slam and shoot.

drinks.name: KOOL-AID SHOT
drinks.instructions: Pour into a large glass with ice and stir. Add a little cranberry juice to taste.

drinks.name: KOOL-AID SLAMMER
drinks.instructions: Fill half the shot glass with the kool-aid first. Then put a paper towel over the top of the glass and slowly pour in the vodka. If you do it right, you should be able to see that the two liquids are separated, with the vodka on top. Now slam it! The last thing you'll taste is the kool-aid.

drinks.name: KURANT TEA
drinks.instructions: Pour Absolut Kurant into a comfortably big tea-cup. Add the not too hot(!) apple tea and, if you like, some sugar. Enjoy!

drinks.name: LADY LOVE FIZZ
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: LASSI - A SOUTH INDIAN DRINK
drinks.instructions: Blend in a blender for 3 seconds. Lassi is one of the easiest things to make, and there are many ways of making it. Basically, it is buttermilk (yoghurt whisked with water), and you can choose almost any consistency that you like, from the thinnest to the thickest. Serve cold.

drinks.name: LASSI - MANGO
drinks.instructions: Put it all in a blender and pour over crushed ice. You can also use other fruits like strawberries and bananas.

drinks.name: LASSI - SWEET
drinks.instructions: Put all ingredients into a blender and blend until nice and frothy. Serve chilled.

drinks.name: LASSI KHARA
drinks.instructions: Blend (frappe) in blender until frothy. Add torn curry leaves and serve cold.

drinks.name: LASSI RAITA
drinks.instructions: Blend the yoghurt and ice cubes together, until the yoghurt becomes more liquid. Add sugar to taste. The lemon/lime is optional but it gives it a slightly tart taste. Dash of salt. Raita is also good for the summer. Instead of having a traditional salad you can make raita instead.

drinks.name: LEMON DROP
drinks.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

drinks.name: LEMON SHOT
drinks.instructions: Mix Galliano and Absolut Citron in a shot glass, lay lemon wedge sprinkled with sugar over glass and pour a rum over wedge and glass. light rum with a lighter and let burn for a second. Do shot quickly and suck on lemon. If it is done correctly, this will taste like a shot of sweet lemonade.

drinks.name: LEMOUROUDJI
drinks.instructions: Juice the lemons. Peel and grate the ginger. Place the grated ginger and a liberal dash of the cayenne pepper into a piece of cheesecloth, and tie it into a knot. Let soak in the water. After 15 minutes or so, add the sugar, and the lemon juice. Chill, and serve.

drinks.name: LIMEADE
drinks.instructions: In a large glass, put the lime juice and sugar, and stir well. Add cold seltzer water to fill. Put the lime peels in the glass. Drink. Repeat until limes or soda run out.

drinks.name: LIMONA CORONA
drinks.instructions: Open the Corona. Fill the empty space in the neck in the bottle with the rum. The bottle should be filled to the top. Plug the bottle with your thumb or the palm of your hand. Turn the bottle upside-down so the rum and beer mix. Turn the bottle rightside-up, unplug, and drink.

drinks.name: LOCH LOMOND
drinks.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, Drambuie, and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: LONDON TOWN
drinks.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: LONE TREE COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: LONE TREE COOLER
drinks.instructions: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice, add gin and vermouth, and stir. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

drinks.name: LONG ISLAND ICED TEA
drinks.instructions: Mix all contents in a highball glass and sitr gently. Add dash of Coca-Cola for the coloring and garnish with lemon or lime twist.

drinks.name: LONG ISLAND TEA
drinks.instructions: Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass. Add the splash of cola for color. Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve.

drinks.name: LONG VODKA
drinks.instructions: Shake a tall glass with ice cubes and Angostura, coating the inside of the glass. Por the vodka onto this, add 1 slice of lime and squeeze juice out of remainder, mix with tonic, stir and voila you have a Long Vodka

drinks.name: LORD AND LADY
drinks.instructions: Pour the rum and Tia Maria into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: LUNCH BOX
drinks.instructions: Fill a pint glass almost full with beer. Then fill the rest with orange juice (careful not to fill it to the top). Then take the shot of Amaretto and drop it in.

drinks.name: MAI TAI
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish and serve with straw.

drinks.name: MALIBU TWISTER
drinks.instructions: Add rum & trister then, add cranberry jucie,stir

drinks.name: MANGO ORANGE SMOOTHIE
drinks.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

drinks.name: MANHATTAN
drinks.instructions: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

drinks.name: MARGARITA
drinks.instructions: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.

drinks.name: MARTINEZ COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

drinks.name: MARTINI
drinks.instructions: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

drinks.name: MARY PICKFORD
drinks.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass

drinks.name: MASALA CHAI
drinks.instructions: Bring 2 cups of water to boil. Add all the ingredients and boil again for about 15 seconds. Let stand for a minute. Warm milk in a pot. Filter tea into cups. Add milk and sugar. That's IT.

drinks.name: MELYA
drinks.instructions: Brew espresso. In a coffee mug, place 1 teaspoon of unsweetened powdered cocoa, then cover a teaspoon with honey and drizzle it into the cup. Stir while the coffee brews, this is the fun part. The cocoa seems to coat the honey without mixing, so you get a dusty, sticky mass that looks as though it will never mix. Then all at once, presto! It looks like dark chocolate sauce. Pour hot espresso over the honey, stirring to dissolve. Serve with cream.

drinks.name: MIAMI VICE
drinks.instructions: First: Mix pina colada with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice(set aside). Second: Mix daiquiri with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice. Third: While frozen, add pina colda mix then daiquiri mix in glass (Making sure they do not get mixed together).

drinks.name: MICROWAVE HOT COCOA
drinks.instructions: Combine sugar, cocoa, salt and hot water in 1-quart micro-proof measuring cup (or coffee mug). Microwave at HIGH (100%) for 1 to 1 1/2 minutes or until boiling. Add milk, sitr and microwave an additonal 1 1/2 to 2 minutes or until hot. Stir in vanilla, blend well.

drinks.name: MIDNIGHT COWBOY
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: MIDNIGHT MANX
drinks.instructions: Fill a mixer with ice and add Baileys, Kahlua, Goldshlager, and cream. Shake for 5 seconds and Strain into a double rocks glass filled with ice. Add chilled coffee Stir and enjoy!

drinks.name: MIDNIGHT MINT
drinks.instructions: If available, rim cocktail (Martini) glass with sugar syrup then dip into chocolate flakes or powder. Add ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well then strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: MIMOSA
drinks.instructions: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Serve cold.

drinks.name: MISSISSIPPI PLANTERS PUNCH
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: MOCHA-BERRY
drinks.instructions: pour 6 oz. of coffee in a mug or Irish coffee cup. add coca mix and chambord, mix well and top off with whipped cream.

drinks.name: MOJITO
drinks.instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Garnish and serve with straw.

drinks.name: MOJITO #3
drinks.instructions: Put mint with lemon juice in a glas, mash the mint with a spoon, ice, rum & fill up with club soda. Top it with Angostura.

drinks.name: MONKEY GLAND
drinks.instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: MONKEY WRENCH
drinks.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: MORANGUITO
drinks.instructions: first you put rhe absinthe, then put tequila, then put the Granadine syrup.

drinks.name: MOSCOW MULE
drinks.instructions: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish.

drinks.name: MOTHER'S MILK
drinks.instructions: Shake over ice, strain. Serves two.

drinks.name: MUDSLINGER
drinks.instructions: Add all contents to a large jug or punch bowl. Stir well!

drinks.name: MULLED WINE
drinks.instructions: Simmer 3 cups water with, sugar, cloves, cinnamon sticks, and lemon peel in a stainless steel pot for 10 minutes. Add wine heat to a "coffee temperature" (DO NOT BOIL) then add the brandy.

drinks.name: NATIONAL AQUARIUM
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker of ice. Shake well. Serve on the rocks.

drinks.name: NEGRONI
drinks.instructions: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

drinks.name: NEW YORK LEMONADE
drinks.instructions: Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Lemon and sugar the rim. Stir and Strain.

drinks.name: NEW YORK SOUR
drinks.instructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Float claret on top. Decorate with the half-slice of lemon and the cherry and serve.

drinks.name: NUKED HOT CHOCOLATE
drinks.instructions: Mix with a bit of milk (1 oz or so) in coffee mug. Nuke mug for about 30-50 seconds. Stir until the heated cocoa dissolves. Fill mug with milk. Nuke for 1-2 minutes, depending on wattage and preferences as to burnt mouth parts.

drinks.name: NUTTY IRISHMAN
drinks.instructions: Serve over ice

drinks.name: OLD FASHIONED
drinks.instructions:
Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved.
Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.

Garnish with orange twist, and a cocktail cherry.

drinks.name: ORANGE CRUSH
drinks.instructions: Add all ingredients to tumbler-Pour as shot

drinks.name: ORANGE OASIS
drinks.instructions: Shake brandy, gin, and orange juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: ORANGE PUSH-UP
drinks.instructions: Combine liquors in a blender. Add a half scoop of ice and blend. Garnish with an orange and cherry flag. So good it will melt in your mouth!!!

drinks.name: ORANGE SCENTED HOT CHOCOLATE
drinks.instructions: Combine all ingredients in heavy medium saucepan. Stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Increase heat and bring just to a boil, stirring often. Remove from heat and whisk untily frothy. Return to heat and bring to boil again. Remove from heat, whisk until frothy. Repeat heating and whisking once again. Discard orange peel. (Can be prepared 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature. Before serving, bring just to boil, remove from heat and whisk until frothy.) Pour hot chocolate into coffee mugs. Makes 2 servings.

drinks.name: ORANGE WHIP
drinks.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.

drinks.name: ORANGEADE
drinks.instructions: Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler or highball glass, add lemon juice, orange juice, sugar syrup, and stir well. Top up with cold soda water, serve with a drinking straw.

drinks.name: OREO MUDSLIDE
drinks.instructions: Blend Vodka, Kahlua, Bailey's, ice-cream and the Oreo well in a blender. Pour into a large frosted glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a cherry.

drinks.name: ORGASM
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: OWEN'S GRANDMOTHER'S REVENGE
drinks.instructions: Add ingredients and mix in blender.

drinks.name: PARADISE
drinks.instructions: Shake together over ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

drinks.name: PINA COLADA
drinks.instructions: Mix with crushed ice in blender until smooth. Pour into chilled glass, garnish and serve.

drinks.name: PINEAPPLE GINGERALE SMOOTHIE
drinks.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

drinks.name: PINK GIN
drinks.instructions: Pour the bitters into a wine glass. Swirl the glass to coat the inside with the bitters, shake out the excess. Pour the gin into the glass. Do not add ice.

drinks.name: PINK LADY
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: PINK PANTY PULLDOWNS
drinks.instructions: Shake well

drinks.name: PINK PENOCHA
drinks.instructions: mix all ingredients into bowl keep iced stir frequently

drinks.name: PISCO SOUR
drinks.instructions: Vigorously shake and strain contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then pour into glass and garnish with bitters.[1]

drinks.name: PLANTER'S PUNCH
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, "on top". Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.

drinks.name: POPPED CHERRY
drinks.instructions: Served over ice in a tall glass with a popped cherry (can add more popped cherries if in the mood)!

drinks.name: POPPY COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: PORT AND STARBOARD
drinks.instructions: Pour carefully into a pousse-cafe glass, so that creme de menthe floats on grenadine. Serve without mixing.

drinks.name: PORT WINE COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: PORT WINE FLIP
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: PORTO FLIP
drinks.instructions: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

drinks.name: PYSCH VITAMIN LIGHT
drinks.instructions: Shake with ice.

drinks.name: QUAKER'S COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: QUARTER DECK COCKTAIL
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: QUEEN BEE
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: QUEEN CHARLOTTE
drinks.instructions: Pour red wine and grenadine into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: QUEEN ELIZABETH
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: QUENTIN
drinks.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Kahlua, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

drinks.name: QUICK F**K
drinks.instructions: In a shot glass add 1/3 Kahlua first. Then 1/3 Miduri, topping it off with a 1/3 bailey's irish cream

drinks.name: QUICK-SAND
drinks.instructions: Simply add the orange juice, quite a quick pour in order to mix the sambucca with the orange juice. The juice MUST have fruit pulp!

drinks.name: RADIOACTIVE LONG ISLAND ICED TEA
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a very tall glass. Sip cautiously.

drinks.name: RADLER
drinks.instructions: Pour beer into large mug, slowly add the 7-up (or Sprite).

drinks.name: RAIL SPLITTER
drinks.instructions: Mix sugar syrup with lemon juice in a tall glass. Fill up with ginger ale.

drinks.name: RASPBERRY COOLER
drinks.instructions: Pour the raspberry vodka and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: RED SNAPPER
drinks.instructions: One shot each, shake n shoot

drinks.name: ROSE
drinks.instructions: Shake together in a cocktail shaker, then strain into chilled glass. Garnish and serve.

drinks.name: ROYAL BITCH
drinks.instructions: Into a shot glass layer the Crown Royal on top of the Frangelico.

drinks.name: ROYAL FIZZ
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass. Fill with cola and serve.

drinks.name: ROYAL FLUSH
drinks.instructions: Pour all the ingredients into tumbler over ice. Strain into glass.

drinks.name: ROYAL GIN FIZZ
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: RUBY TUESDAY
drinks.instructions: Pour gin and cranberry into a highball filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and stir.

drinks.name: RUM COBBLER
drinks.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the rum. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

drinks.name: RUM COOLER
drinks.instructions: Pour the rum and soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

drinks.name: RUM MILK PUNCH
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: RUM OLD-FASHIONED
drinks.instructions: Stir powdered sugar, water, and bitters in an old-fashioned glass. When sugar has dissolved add ice cubes and light rum. Add the twist of lime peel, float 151 proof rum on top, and serve.

drinks.name: RUM PUNCH
drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl and serve.

drinks.name: RUM RUNNER
drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass & add ice.

drinks.name: RUM SCREWDRIVER
